title: Runes page issue
body:
Hi, Riot 

I had a runes problem in last month, that affects my gaming experiences.  I cannot change the runes pages when I am at client, so I only have 3pages that can be used, but when I ban\pick champion and want to change runes, they become exactly the same name, such as I have AP AD AD attack speed,but when I chose the champion ,they become AP AP AP. The most serious is I always got wrong runes in game. I take AP runes for AD carry, take AD runes for AP champion,  I think this problem is personally so I want to you could help me to resolve it please. 
I hope you can check my email as soon as possible.

replies.body: We've seen a few issues with stuck or duplicating rune pages when trying to move them around or giving them a name with special characters.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll get this fixed up for you manually.  Hang tight and we'll see you theree!
I'm pretty sure that if you hover over the rune page it'll show you what stat changes it gives you.
